comments:
Description:
There is a report design, add a bookmark as row["Date"] on a data item, and add a image, hperlink to this bookmark. Error occurs when preview the report.

Expected result:
If bookmark could not support this expression, it should give some prompt.

Error log:
The following items have errors:

- There are errors evaluating script "row["ddate"]".

Error will occur if you DONOT set a data-binding on the image.
I have a test:
1.add an image
2.set a data-binding on the image
3.add a bookmark as row["Date"] on the image
4.hperlink to this bookmark

and the test succeed.

Invalid.

All the element which uses the column of dataset should be binded the dataset.

Close.
